name: GIRLS VR
description:
You are a lucky guy, it turns out the building where you bought the flat,
is inhabited only by beautiful and sexy girls,
You are the only one man living in a ten-storey building.

On the floor:

1 - Twins Sisters
2 - White Angels
3 - ???
4 - ???
5 - Secretary
6 - Mature Women
7 - ???
8 - Night Club
9 - My flat
10 - ???

Girls vr is an experience where you move the elevator between
floors and watch shows, each girl dances and has her own unique music.
You can also meet them all at the night club and spend a crazy night
on the dance floor. After the finished party, you can go to your own apartment
and choose one of the girls for the rest of the night.
If you need to relax, go to the terrace and admire the beauty of the city at night.
